** \url{} works, trims spaces
.
\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{,hyperref , ,}  % should work anyway!

\begin{document}
\url{  https://github.com/michael-brade/LaTeX.js }

\href{ https://github.com/michael-brade/LaTeX.js }{LaTeX.js source}
\end{document}
.
<div class="body">
<p><a href="https://github.com/michael-brade/LaTeX.js">https://github.com/michael-brade/LaTeX.js</a></p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/michael-brade/LaTeX.js">LaTeX.js source</a></p>
</div>
